title: Portfolio
description: Created a personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experiences, with a focus on responsive design and user-friendly navigation.

title: QuillCraft
description: Built a collaborative online writing platform that supports real-time editing blogs with user interactions for example liking, commenting, bookmarking blogs.

title: User Registration (Backend)
description: Developed a scalable and efficient backend system using Node.js and Express, focusing on RESTful API design and database optimization.

title: Notion Clone
description: Developed a fully-functional Notion clone, enabling users to create, edit, and organize notes and tasks with rich text formatting and real-time collaboration features. The application supports drag-and-drop capabilities, customizable templates, and seamless data synchronization across devices, providing a versatile workspace for both personal and team productivity.

title: PDF Chatbot
description: Created a platform where users can upload PDFs and receive accurate answers to their questions via embedded AI.Composed an AI system to provide precise and contextually relevant answers from uploaded PDFs

title: Connect
description: Enabled users to connect and communicate seamlessly through web-based chat. Implemented end-to-end encryption using the Diffie-Hellman key exchange and AES-256 encryption algorithms to secure users messages. Ensured that all user communications are protected and inaccessible to unauthorized parties.

title: BlogItOut
description: Built a collaborative online writing platform that supports real-time editing blogs with user interactions for example liking, commenting, bookmarking blogs.

title: Snake Game
description: Built a classic snake game, featuring various levels and scoring mechanisms for an engaging gaming experience

title: Password Generator
description: Developed a secure password generator to create strong, random passwords, enhancing user security and data protection.

title: Currency Converter
description: Implemented a currency converter tool that allows users to convert between different currencies with real-time exchange rates.

title: Weather Report
description: Created a weather forecasting application that provides real-time weather data and predictions using API integrations for location-based services.

title: Event Handler
description: Developed a feature-rich ToDo app to help users efficiently manage tasks and boost productivity. The application provides a user-friendly interface for creating, editing, organizing, and tracking tasks.

title: Calculator
description: Developed a basic calculator app with functions for arithmetic operations, supporting a simple and intuitive user interface.
